name: SM64 Shining Stars Repainted
storyline: Mario returns to the location of SM64 Shining Stars seven months after the events of Shining Stars 3: Sanctuary of the Star Comet.
summary:
SM64 Shining Stars Repainted is a remake of SM64 Shining Stars made by pieordie1 and released May 30, 2020. It is a ROM hack (mod) of Super Mario 64.
Mario returns to the location of SM64 Shining Stars seven months after the events of Shining Stars 3: Sanctuary of the Star Comet.
